narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this announced prelicense inspection. 
This is a 1st Prelicense Inspection for a Class “B” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. The Applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478. 
 
End Section
